resources:
MusicBee Remote When pressed it toggles the volume mute. When pressed it changes the repeat (all/none). When pressed it changes the shuffle mode (on/off). When pressed it plays the previous track When pressed either it starts playing a track or pauses it if it is already playing. When pressed it plays the next track. It displays the album cover for the current track. Settings Connection Settings Miscellaneous Incoming call action Default action on incoming call 

Requires permission to read the Phone State. This service is responsible for the communication of the application with the plugin. Remote Control Application for MusicBee Share About MusicBee Remote MusicBee Remote Version Search Offline Authenticating Connected SCAN ADD Represents if this connection is the default selected connection Open source licenses Manage Connections Library Track Action What should happen when you press on a track entry in the library. License Help & Feedback Exit Used as an anchor for drag and drop Should be shown if the track is currently playing Home Now playing Lyrics Queue Last Queue Next Get Album Tracks Play Now Get Albums Get Artists Last.fm Scrobbling How you feel about the application? Feedback Send Feedback Feedback Help MusicBeeRemote InApp Feedback Send feedback using… Plugin Update Check Periodically check for updated versions of the plugin - More options Options Playlists Library Search your library Previous Play/Pause Nextdw No lyrics found Enables debug logging for the application. May cause performance degradation since it logs everything. Debug Logging No tracks found No playlists found No artists found No albums found No tracks found No genres found Swipe to refresh the list. There was an error while trying to load the playlists. Search and play a track Include Device & Application Information 

Device: %1$s %2$s Android(%3$s)
MusicBee Remote v%4$s Include Logs Play Now (Queue All) Play Now (Queue Artist) Play Now (Queue Album) Press here to sync Attempting to establish connection… Output Library Sync State Library Sync Information Albums Genres Artists Tracks Playlists The following metadata entries are currently available to MusicBee Remote: Radio There was an error while refreshing the radio stations The radio station has been queued successfully. The radio station could not be queued. No radio stations found It seems that you have connected to an older version of the plugin.

Some features will not function properly unless you update the plugin to %1$s. Plugin Update Required Update icon MusicBee Remote MusicBee Remote controls notification BottomNavigationActivity Could not queue the radio due to a network error Radio station list was refreshed successfully No radio stations found Playlist Refresh was successful Now playing list was refreshed successfully There was a problem refreshing the now playing list There are no lyrics for this track %1$s - %2$s mbrc__actions Add tracks to the queue Adding tracks to the queue Actions Notifications that are the result of user actions such as sync or queue Library Sync Library sync is in progress %1$d of %2$d genres %1$d of %2$d albums %1$d of %2$d artists %1$d of %2$d tracks %1$d of %2$d playlists %1$d of %2$d covers "Syncing %1$d of %2$d %3$s" Genres Artists Albums Tracks Playlists Covers mbrc://%1$s:%2$d Display only album artists Connect to the plugin Opens the navigation menu Press to remove the track from the favorites Press to add the track to favorites Open the rating dialog to rate a track Open the menu with the share and last.fm scrobbling options Revision Build Time None Reduce Pause Stop
